entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
